`@id/textViewEventName` can overlap `@id/deleteButton` if @id/textViewEventName grows due to localized text expansion
`@id/textViewUserName` can overlap `@id/deleteUserButton` if @id/textViewUserName grows due to localized text expansion
`@id/publish_button` can overlap `@id/choose_qr_button` if @string/choose_make_qr_string, @string/save_publish_string grow due to localized text expansion
When you define `paddingLeft` you should probably also define `paddingRight` for right-to-left symmetry

Consider replacing `android:paddingLeft` with `android:paddingStart="100dp"` to better support right-to-left layouts
